Class ReceiptsView

java.lang.Object
BTOManagementSystem.View.ReceiptsView
public class ReceiptsView extends Object
The ReceiptsView class handles the presentation layer for viewing and filtering receipt records in the BTO Management System.

It provides methods for prompting the user for various filter options and displaying formatted receipt data.

  • Method Details

    • PromptFilters

      public int PromptFilters()
      Prompts the user to select a filter type for viewing receipts.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the user's selected filter option.

    • promptFilterValueForMartialStatus

      public String promptFilterValueForMartialStatus()
      Prompts the user to select a marital status filter.
      Returns:
      the selected marital status as a string ("Married" or "Single").

    • promptFilterValueForFlatType

      public String promptFilterValueForFlatType()
      Prompts the user to select a flat type filter.
      Returns:
      the selected flat type as a string ("2-Room" or "3-Room").

    • promptFilterValueForAgeRange

      public String promptFilterValueForAgeRange()
      Prompts the user to enter an age range filter.
      Returns:
      a string representing the concatenated lower and upper bounds.

    • promptFilterValueForProjectName

      public String promptFilterValueForProjectName()
      Prompts the user to enter a project name filter.
      Returns:
      the entered project name as a string.

    • DisplayReceipts

      public void DisplayReceipts(ArrayList<Receipt> receipts, String[] headers)
      Displays a list of receipts in a formatted table view.
      Parameters:
      receipts - the list of receipts to display.
      headers - the headers to use for table columns.

    • invalid_input_message

      public void invalid_input_message()
      Displays an error message for invalid input.
